item.title: @elonmusk: Spoke to a NASA staffer yesterday and asked how she feels: - Isaacman is working around the clock - ...
item.description: Spoke to a NASA staffer yesterday and asked how she feels: - Isaacman is working around the clock - She‚Äôs been formally asked, for the first time in seven years, ‚Äúhow is bureaucracy holding you back, and how can I help?‚Äù - She‚Äôs never been more excited to work at NASA

item.title: @elonmusk: This is what a mind virus looks like in AmericaüëáüèΩ Obama deployed ICE and deported over 5 million ill...
item.description: This is what a mind virus looks like in AmericaüëáüèΩ Obama deployed ICE and deported over 5 million illegals during his presidency: Not a single protest, not a single word from the media. Not a single activist. Not a single ICE agent harassed or killed. Not a single judge prohibited the deportations in the court. FYI, Clinton deported over 12 million. Obama facilitated the bombing of Libya, FOR 7 MONTHS, with no congressional permission: Not a single word from the media. Not a single word from the activists. Not a single protest held. Not a word from politicians. Trump deploys ICE to deport people in our country illegally: weekly protest, judges inhibiting courts, media demonizing ICE and the president, activists leading the harassment of agents and officers, ICE agents threatened, ambushed and killed. Trump goes into Venezuela in under 3 hours and extracts a monstrous dictator, who had a bounty on his head even under Biden and brings him back to the states to face trial: Media demonizes the president, mass protests, Trump is a dictator, vigils‚Ä¶ The mind virus in America, folks. I could go all day with more examples. All day. All day long. Pray for those who are afflicted.

item.description: Minnesota was 98% White in 1973. As Time magazine noted, little corruption in politics, low crime, high civic pride. What happened to the state was done deliberately and with malicious intent.
